core.tut.pori.properties

Class SystemProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.properties.SystemProperty
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CAProperties, ExecutorProperties, FacebookProperties, FileProperties, FuzzyProperties, GoogleProperties, NonceProperties, TwitterProperties, UserServiceProperties

    public abstract class SystemProperty
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for property files. All classes sub-classed from this base class will automatically be loaded and initialized by the system property handler.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONFIGURATION_FILE_PATH

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public abstract void initialize(java.util.Properties properties)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialize the system property. Note that when using the default file path, the passed object will be of type UnmodifiableProperties, and when using a custom file path, the object will be of type Properties
        Parameters:
        properties -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getPropertyFilePath

        public java.lang.String getPropertyFilePath()
        By default, this returns null. On null value, the default system property file will be used. If non-null value is provided, the path will be used to load the requested properties.
        Returns:
        the path of the configuration file for this Property
